carousel.title: Gluten Free Chicken Darjeeling Steam Momo

info.name: Gluten Free Chicken Darjeeling Steam Momo
info.description: Serves 1 | Soft, juicy boneless chicken mixed with onion, coriander, and spices, wrapped in gluten-free dough made with quinoa and chickpeas. Lower in calories, higher in protein. Served with spicy Darjeeling sauce. [5 pcs] Calories: 273.22 | Protein: 11.13g per 100g. (Serves 1).

info.name: Veg Darjeeling Steam Momo
info.description: Momo stuffed with freshly chopped vegetables (onion, carrot, cabbage, beans & coriander), herbs and pinch of spices. Served with authentic Darjeeling Momo sauce and we don't serve green sauce (5 pcs).Steam momos taste best when eaten with hand. 100 gms/ 187.98 kcal. (Serves 1).

info.name: Chicken Darjeeling Steam Momo
info.description: Momo stuffed with mix of soft juicy boneless chicken, onion & coriander cooked in blend of herbs and tinch of spices. Served with Darjeeling momo sauce and we don't serve green sauce [5 pcs]. Steam momos taste best when eaten with hand.100 gms / 261.22 Kcal. (Serves 1).

info.name: Chicken Cheese Steam Momo
info.description: Soft juicy boneless chicken, with the flavour of in house spices. Served with schezwan red chilli sauce (5 pcs ). Steam momos taste best when eaten with hand.100 gms / 214.54 Kcal. (Serves 1).

info.name: Chicken Masala Steam Momo
info.description: Soft juicy boneless chicken, with the flavour of in home spices. Served with red chilli sauce and green coriander chutney. [5 pcs]. Steam momos taste best when eaten with hand.100 gms / 214.54 Kcal. (Serves 1).

info.name: Chicken Delight Steam Momo
info.description: Introducing yellow delight momos: 5 pcs of veggie-chicken blend, spiced and wrapped in yellow dough. Steamed momo served with red chilli sauce; no green sauce. Best enjoyed by hand! (Serves 1).

info.name: Veg Himalayan Steam Momo
info.description: Indulge in the authentic taste of the hills with our veggie and soya chunks-loaded steam momos. Each bite is a burst of flavor, served with the popular Wow Momo sauce and our home-made red chilli sauce. These Steam Momo [5 pcs] are a finger-licking delight! Please note, we don't serve green coriander chutney. Enjoy the delicious experience! (Serves 1).

info.name: Chicken Himalayan Steam Momo
info.description: Savor the burst of delightful spices in every bite of our steam momos, offering an authentic taste of the hills. Accompanied by our home-made red chilli sauce, this set of 5 pcs momos is a finger-licking delight! Please note, we don't serve green coriander chutney. Enjoy the flavorful. (Serves 1)

info.name: Veg Pahari Feast Steam Momo
info.description: Serves 1 | Indulge in the authentic taste of the mountains with our Veg Pahari Feast Steam Momo. Each momo is filled with a perfect blend of traditional spices and fresh vegetables, delivering a burst of flavor in every bite. Paired with red chilli sauce [5 pcs], this dish offers a harmonious balance of taste and heat, making it a true feast for your senses! (Serves 1).

info.name: Veg Pahari Fresh Steam Momo
info.description: Serves 1 | Savor the essence of the mountains with our Veg Pahari Fresh Steam momo, brimming with vibrant vegetables and infused with mountain-inspired flavors. Each bite is perfectly complemented by our red chilli sauce [5 pcs], offering a harmonious blend of freshness and spice. A truly balanced and flavorful experience in every bite! (Serves 1).

info.name: Chicken Pahari Feast Steam Momo
info.description: Serves 1 | Indulge in our pahari chicken steam ,momo, featuring tender chicken seasoned with a perfect blend of traditional pahari spices. Each momo is complemented by red chilli sauce [5 pcs], delivering a perfectly balanced fusion of flavors in every bite. A taste of the hills in every mouthful! (Serves 1).

info.name: Chicken Pahari Fresh Steam Momo
info.description: Serves 1 | Savor the essence of the mountains with our chicken pahari fresh steam momo, packed with vibrant vegetables, chicken and mountain-inspired flavors. Paired with a red sauce [5 pcs], each bite delivers a perfect balance of freshness and spice for a flavorful experience! (Serves 1).

info.name: Veg Hot Garlic steam Momo
info.description: Delight in the spicy goodness of our hot garlic momos, where succulent momos meet a tantalizing sweet and garlic-infused kick. Accompanied by our home-made red chilli sauce [5 pcs], these Steam Momo are a finger-licking delight! Please note, we don't serve green coriander chutney. Enjoy the flavorful experience! (Serves 1).

info.name: Chatpata Paneer Steam Momo
info.description: Savor the goodness of delicious momos, filled with freshly chopped veggies, paneer, a hint of spices, and blended with Indian masala. Accompanied by our tantalizing red chilli sauce (5 pcs). Enjoy the authentic experience as steam momos taste best when eaten by hand. Please note, we don't serve green coriander chutney. Indulge in 100 gms of flavor-packed delight at 310.10 Kcal. (Serves 1).

info.name: Corn & Cheese Steam Momo
info.description: Wow! Momo signature dish: Momos filled with shredded cheese and sweet corn, infused with the rich flavors of Indian spices. Accompanied by our home-made red chilli sauce (5 pcs). Steam momos are a finger-licking delight! Please note, we don't serve green coriander chutney. Enjoy 100 gms of pure bliss at 206.13 Kcal. (Serves 1).

info.name: Chicken Himalayan Chilli Momo
info.description: Experience the true essence of the hills with our chicken Himalayan chilli momos. Delight in each bite as it overflows with a blend of delightful spices, expertly combined with kothey and a touch of chilli seasoning mix. This delightful plate of momos [5 pcs} requires no extra sauce, it's a flavor-packed experience on its own! (Serves 1).

info.name: Chicken Masala Chilli Momo
info.description: Experience the fusion magic of our enfused chicken masala chilli momos, packed with Kothey delightful chili flavors and a burst of colors (5 pcs). No extra sauceserved; let the fusion perfection speak for itself! (Serves 1).

info.name: Chicken Darjeeling Chilli Momo
info.description: Authentic chicken kothey blended with chilli seasoning mix. Served with it's rustic magic flavors. We don't serve additional sauce with this plate of momos [5 pcs]. (Serves 1).

info.name: Veg Darjeeling Fried Peri Peri Momo
info.description: Introducing veg darjeeling fried peri peri momo 5 pcs of vegetable-packed, herb-infused momos, crispy fried to perfection. Make it even more exciting by placing them in our shake bag, mixing with peri peri seasoning, and serving with red chilli sauce. No green coriander sauce served. Enjoy the WOW factor! 100 gms / 236.78 Kcal. (Serves 1).

(5 pcs). (Serves 1).

info.name: Veg Himalayan Steam Momo 6Pc + Veg Moburg 2Pc + One 250ml Soft Drinks
info.description: Savor our Veg Himalayan Steam Momo paired with Spicy Red Sauce. Dive into our irresistible Momo burger, featuring crispy fried Veg Momos, complemented by red Chilli sauce, Green sauce, and creamy Mayonnaise. Perfectly balanced flavors in every bite! Enjoy it with a refreshing drinks. Best enjoyed by hand for the ultimate taste experience! (Serves 2).

info.name: Chicken Himalayan Steam Momo 6Pc+Chk Moburg 2Pc+ One 250ml Soft Drinks
info.description: Experience the rich flavors of our Chicken Himalayan Steam Momo with a kick of Spicy Red Sauce. Immerse yourself in the tempting Momo burger, featuring crunchy fried Chicken Momos, perfectly balanced with red Chilli sauce, Green sauce, and luscious Mayonnaise. Each bite is a symphony of taste! Pair it with a refreshing drinks, and for the ultimate indulgence, savor it by hand for a unique culinary delight. (Serves 2).

info.name: Rasmalai [2PC]
info.description: Ras Malai is a delectable Indian sweet made with tender cheese balls immersed in a rich, sweetened milk flavored with cardamom. It's beautifully topped with finely chopped nuts, creating a creamy and aromatic dessert that's both flavorful and visually delightful. Per Serving: Calories 186kcal, Total Protein 6g (Serves 1-2) (Approx).
